scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: LIBRARY_NAME=reduxMockStore NODE_ENV=development $(npm bin)/webpack src/index.js dist/index.js --config webpack.build.js
scripts.build:umd:min: LIBRARY_NAME=reduxMockStore NODE_ENV=production $(npm bin)/webpack -p src/index.js dist/index.min.js --config webpack.build.js
scripts.prepublish: $(npm bin)/rimraf dist lib && npm run build
